All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CoachClient
Client that encapsulates the coach threads.
Config
Definition of the simulation configuration.
ContestantClient
Client that encapsulates the contestant threads.
ContestantsBench
Contestants bench.
EGeneralRepository_Coach
Possible states of the coach.
EGeneralRepository_Contestant
Possible states of the contestant.
EGeneralRepository_Referee
Possible states of the referee.
GeneralRepository
General Repository of Information.
IContestantsBench
General interface for the contestants bench, that extends from the contestants bench interfaces for the contestant and the coach.
IContestantsBench_Coach
Interface for the coach in the contestants bench.
IContestantsBench_Contestant
Interface for the contestant in the contestants bench.
IGeneralRepository
General interface for the general repository, that extends from the general repository interfaces for the referee site, bench and the playground.
IGeneralRepository_Bench
Interface for the bench in the general repository.
IGeneralRepository_Playground
Interface for the playground in the general repository.
IGeneralRepository_Site
Interface for the referee site in the general repository.
IPlayground
General interface for the playground, that extends from the playground interfaces for the playground.
IPlayground_Coach
Interface for the coach in the playground.
IPlayground_Contestant
Interface for the contestant in the playground.
IPlayground_Referee
Interface of the referee in the playground.
IRefereeSite
General interface for the referee site, that extends from the referee and coach interfaces for the referee site.
IRefereeSite_Coach
Interface for the coach in the referee site.
IRefereeSite_Referee
Interface for the referee in the referee site.
Playground
Playground.
RefereeClient
Client that encapsulates the referee thread.
RefereeSite
Referee Site.
Register
Operational interface of a remote object of type RegisterRemoteObject.
RegisterRemoteObject
Generic functionality to register remote objects in the local registry service.
ServerContestantsBench
Server that encapsulates the contestants bench.
ServerGeneralRepository
Server side of the General Repository of Information.
ServerPlayground
Server that encapsulates the playground.
ServerRefereeSite
Server that encapsulates the referee site.
ServerRegisterRemoteObject
Instantiation and registering of a remote object that enables the registration of other remote objects located in the same or other processing nodes of a parallel machine in the local registry service.
TCoach
Coach thread.
TContestant
Contestant thread.
TReferee
Referee thread.
